allowExportEncKey.name: Allow export the encrypt key
allowExportEncKey.description[zh_CN]: 用于控制是否显示加密密钥导出窗口
allowExportEncKey.description: It's used to control whether or not the encryption key export window is displayed

encryptAlgorithm.name: Encrypt algorithm
encryptAlgorithm.description[zh_CN]: 分区加密所使用的默认加密算法
encryptAlgorithm.description: It's the default algorithm for encrypting partitions

enableEncrypt.name: Enable partition encrypt
enableEncrypt.description[zh_CN]: 用于控制分区加密功能是否在文管启用
enableEncrypt.description: It's used to control whether to enable partition encryption feature in dde-file-manager.
